details.arabic_diacless: ربنا اٰتنا فى الدنيا حسنة وفى الاٰخرة حسنة وقنا عذاب النار
details.arabic: رَبَّنَآ اٰتِنَا فِى الدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةً وَّفِى الۡاٰخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَّقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
details.transliteration: Rabbana aatina fiddunya hasanatan wa fil aakhirati hasanatan waqina azaabannaar
details.translations: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

pageTitle: Seeking good of this world and the hereafter [2:201]
